summary: This is an IRS Criminal Investigative Division memorandum documenting an interview with Tara Lordi conducted on September 10, 2019. The document references several business entities potentially connected to financial investigations, including South Atlantic Regional Center, Royal Palm Business Center, Highland Global Solutions, Palm House Hotel, New Haven South Construction, NJL Development, and NJL Investments.

persons.name: Tara Lordi
persons.context: Tara Lordi was interviewed by IRS Criminal Investigative Division agents on September 10, 2019, as documented in this memorandum.

events.title: IRS-CID Interview of Tara Lordi
events.description: IRS Criminal Investigative Division agents conducted an interview with Tara Lordi, documented in this memorandum.

keyFacts: The document is an IRS Criminal Investigative Division (IRS-CID) memorandum of interview.
The interview subject is Tara Lordi, interviewed on September 10, 2019.

The document references multiple business entities: South Atlantic Regional Center, Royal Palm Business Center, Highland Global Solutions, Palm House Hotel, New Haven South Construction, NJL Development, and NJL Investments.
The case synopsis indicates a focus on corporate fraud.
The document is marked as UNCLASSIFIED and was approved/drafted on September 24, 2019.
